content.p: This category contains important information on the governance and oversight of the Quality Manual and how to propose changes or cases outside of regulations; as well as information about Periodic Assurance and Continuous Enhancement Reviews (PACERs), External Examiners, Professional, Statutory and Regulatory Bodies (PSRBs) and degree outcomes. These pages may be of interest to staff and students across all of the UK, China and Malaysia campuses. About the Quality Manual Quality and Standards Committee International campuses and quality assurance How to propose changes to the Quality Manual How to submit a 'outside regulation' case to the Quality and Standards Committee Glossary of terms and abbreviations Programme monitoring and review External Examiners and Examinations roles Professional accreditation reports Degree outcomes statement Conflict of Interest Regulation End Point Assessment Procedure Student Services Academic-Service-Office@nottingham.edu.cn student_registry@nottingham.edu.my Quality-Manual-Enquiries@nottingham.ac.uk Portland Building, University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD
